Hi Everyone!

   I have one site example.com. Worlds DNS records have it's =
IP like 111.111.111.111. Also site with name example.com is at server with =
IP 222.222.222.222. 
   I have to crawl example.com from 222.222.222.222. I=
 wrote in /etc/hosts: 222.222.222.222 example.com
   From web browser after=
 typing example.com result is from 222.222.222.222. 
  How should I configu=
re heritrix to crawl site example.com from 222.222.222.222?
